article:
The 'Governor of the Department of QuindÃ­o' heads the executive branch of the
government of the Colombian department of QuindÃ­o and is Commander-in-Chief of
the departmentâs police forces. He or she is the highest ranking official in the
department, serving as the main agent for the President of Colombia to carry on
the task of maintaining public order and the execution of the general economic
policy, and all matters of law passed down for the nation. The current governor
is Julio Cesar LÃ³pez Espinosa.
